sentences.english: Light up the dance floor with some fantastic dancing moves.
sentences.chinese: 光用一些奇妙的舞蹈动作舞池。

sentences.english: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

sentences.english: Complex expressions 1. Let's get down and boogy!
sentences.chinese: 复杂表达法我们下舞池跳舞吧。

sentences.english: We walked out on the dance floor and held each other awkwardly.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起走下舞池，笨拙地搂着对方。

sentences.english: Two gangs of youths brawled on the dance floor of the ferry.
sentences.chinese: 两伙青年在渡轮的舞池里打起来了。

sentences.english: The younger described simply the position.
sentences.chinese: 少年为他简单描述了舞池的布局。

sentences.english: He owned the dance floor as he and two girls proceeded to cut up a rug.
sentences.chinese: 他将自己与两个女孩剪下的一块地毯做为自己的舞池。

sentences.english: The young people gyrated on the dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻人在舞池里不停地旋转。

sentences.english: You can almost tell she feels at home on the dance-floor.
sentences.chinese: 几乎可以说舞池里的她就像是在自己家。

sentences.english: Woud you rather sit near the dance floor?
sentences.chinese: 您宁愿坐得靠近舞池吗？

sentences.english: Get on the dance floor and show off your jaw-dropping dance moves.
sentences.chinese: 进入舞池并且秀出你令人惊叹的舞技。

sentences.english: But you are the queen of the dancefloor.
Imagine what it was like to make such a scene in the middle of the dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 想像一下在舞池中央那样丢人现眼的举止。

sentences.english: His wife is trying to pull him to the dancefloor.
Madonna encouraged everyone to vogue on the dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 玛丹娜鼓励大家在舞池上摆动姿势。

sentences.english: I feel so unsure, As I take your hand and lead you to the dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 我毫无把握，当我牵着你的手带你步入舞池。

definition: disco/night club/abbr. for 迪斯科廳|迪斯科厅
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
